hadiths.text: Tawus said:"We asked Ibn Abbas about squatting (sitting) on the heels. He said: 'It is the Sunnah.' We said: 'We think that it is difficult for a man.' He said: 'Rather, it is Sunnah of your Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الإِقْعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Permission For Squatting
